note: Data for the latest year is based on quarterly reports from the source. These come with a higher level of uncertainty, and in many cases can be underestimates.
title: Deaths in armed conflicts by region
subtitle: Reported deaths of combatants and civilians due to fighting in [armed conflicts](#dod:armed-conflict-ucdp). Deaths due to disease and starvation resulting from the conflict are not included. Data for 2025 is incomplete and includes deaths within the first three quarters.

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches measure armed conflicts and their deaths?
